news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Accacia, an AI-enabled platform targeting real estate decarbonization, successfully raised $6.5 million in a pre-Series A funding round. The investment was led by Illuminate Financial, aiming to expand Accacia's decarbonization solutions for the real estate sector.

about_short_description.short_description: Accacia is an AI-enabled Real Estate Decarbonisation Platform.

product.name: Emissions Measurement and Reporting Platform
product.description: A platform that automates the tracking and calculation of Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions across various real estate asset classes, using data from utility bills, building management systems, and ERPs.

product.name: Embodied Carbon Module
product.description: Automates embodied carbon calculations for building designs, allowing comparison of materials to optimize for lower GWP value materials.

product.name: Financed Emissions Calculation Tool
product.description: Calculates financed emissions for investment portfolios, offering insights into climate risks by asset class and geography, based on the PCAF framework.

product.name: Net-Zero Planning and Tracking Tool
product.description: An AI-driven tool to set net-zero targets, plan decarbonization projects, estimate costs, and track progress towards goals.

product.name: Decarbonization Marketplace
product.description: Connects users with vendors and options for buying offsets to facilitate decarbonization projects.

product.name: API for Data Automation
product.description: Provides API integrations for automating data collection from utility, building management systems, and ERPs, aimed at reducing manual hours in emissions tracking.
